      • mapPluginNames

        public void mapPluginNames(java.util.ArrayList installedPlugins!,
java.util.ArrayList remotePlugins!)
        Iterates through the list of installed plugins and sets the names according to the remote plugin's name. This method was created because in some cases the bbj plugin repository name differed from the plugin name defined in the bbj-plugin.json causing some strange side effects.

      • uninstallPlugin

        public void uninstallPlugin(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)
